philosophy.agentic: Act as an intelligent partner. Plan, execute, and verify.
philosophy.privacy_focused: GDPR compliance, encryption, and audit logging are mandatory.
philosophy.user_centric: Prioritize user goals. Offer proactive solutions.
philosophy.minimalism: Do more with less. Avoid file sprawl.

ssot_documentation.principle: Never duplicate information. Maintain one authoritative file for each concept.
ssot_documentation.update_vs_create: NEVER create a new file if an existing one can be updated.
rules: Update existing docs alongside code changes.
Consolidate information. Merge and delete redundant docs.
Check docs/ before writing new specifications.

naming_conventions.python: snake_case for variables/functions, PascalCase for classes, UPPER_CASE for constants.
naming_conventions.typescript: camelCase for variables/functions, PascalCase for Components/Interfaces.

structure.srp: Functions should do one thing. Keep them small (< 50 lines).

comments.general: Comments should explain the WHY, not the WHAT.

preferences.immutability: Prefer const over let in TS. Avoid global state.
preferences.async_await: Use over raw promises or callbacks.
preferences.functional: Prefer map/filter/reduce over loops where readable.

python.linter: Flake8 or Ruff. No ignored errors without explicit justification.

typescript_react.linter: ESLint with strict config. Fix all warnings.

general: Fix ALL linting errors before requesting user review.
Remove unused imports and dead code immediately.

mcp_servers.config_rule: Verify settings.json paths match Simple378 workspace.

specific_rules: Offline Capability: Design for local SQLite mirror support.
Mens Rea Engine: Define and log 'intent' indicators.
Error Handling: Use custom exception classes. NEVER return raw 500s.

phase_1_planning: SSOT Check: Search for existing files, confirm NO new files unless necessary, plan updates.
Create Artifacts: task.md (granular steps), implementation_plan.md (technical approach).
Approval: Request user review of the plan before major coding.
phase_2_execution: Atomic Changes: Make small, testable edits.
Task Boundaries: Use the task_boundary tool to track progress.
Tool Selection: Prefer specific tools (replace_file_content) over generic ones.
Continuous Cleanup: Run linters/formatters after every significant edit.
phase_3_verification: Static Analysis: Run cargo check (if Rust) or npm run lint / flake8. FIX ALL ERRORS.
Test First: Run existing tests to ensure no regressions.
New Tests: Write unit/integration tests for new features.
Manual Verification: Use browser_subagent or curl.
Walkthrough: Create walkthrough.md to demonstrate success.
